title: tiruttalAgAdO
sahitya:
tiruttalAgAdO ayyA tIya piLLai ennil ennait-


anupallavi

  varuttuginra vinai aghala vazhi kATTi en vAzhvu sirakkat-


caraNam    poi mayakkam koNDa pulanin pOkkai mATriyE pun kavalai sumandiDAdu manadait-tETriyE
veyya kaLLar kaippaDAdu tuyya nallOr enai viDAdu ayyanE nin karuNaikkuriya meyyanAgi uyya nAnum
